H0.text: Who was the illustrator for most of Roald Dahl’s stories for children. Beatrix Potter

H1.text: Who was the illustrator for most of Roald Dahl’s stories for children. Dr. Seuss

H2.text: Who was the illustrator for most of Roald Dahl’s stories for children. Maurice Sendak

H3.text: Who was the illustrator for most of Roald Dahl’s stories for children. Quentin Blake

A4.text: He has illustrated over 300 books, including 18 written by Roald Dahl

A5.text: Blake has illustrated a score of books by Roald Dahl
